name: Kingdom of Erusea
startIntroPart1: Erusea and its people suffered greatly due to the devastation caused by the Ulysses asteroid impacts. Always cast as the villian, it has repeatedly been forced into submission by international military organizations. However, hope for a new Erusea still shines within its people.
startIntroPart2: Princess Cossette, will you be able to learn from the defeats of the past and lead you people to prosperity?
declaringWar: We will no longer suffer your presence. Prepare for war!
attacked: So it has come to this. We shall burn you to the ground!
defeated: And so Erusea is defeated again... but do not think your victory shall last.
introduction: As superior galactic entities, you are not worthy of our attention.
tradeRequest: Would you be interested in this proposition?
unique: [+30]% Production when constructing [Air] units [in all cities]
All newly-trained [Air] units [in all cities] receive the [Bombardment I] promotion
